content: आतिथ्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अतिथेरिदं ष्यञ्] Hospitable, proper for a guest &c. ( = आतिथेय); हविरातिथ्यं, आतिथ्या इष्टिः &c. --थ्यः A guest. --थ्यं {@--1@} Hospitable reception, hospitality; तमातिथ्यक्रियाशांतरथक्षोभपरिश्रमं <ls>R. 1. 58.</ls> {@--2@} A particular rite, the reception of Soma when it is brought to the sacrificial place (also called आतिथ्येष्टिः).
